title: and Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications) Order 2022.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Leader
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Leader 

and Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister environment climate communications) order 2022

title: and Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications) Order 2022.
heading: 2. Edel Hackett, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Edel Hackett, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Environment, Climate and Communications, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is the 
leader of a political party registered in the Register of Political Parties and 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications with effect from 7 
March 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

28 June, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [355] 3
